Class ViewTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • TestParentClass
      • ViewTest
  • public class ViewTest
extends TestParentClass
    This class contains tests for the View.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      ViewTest()  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void testAMainScreen()
      This test displays main screen with the list of all options such as create portfolio, value of portfolio on certain date, value of portfolio on full composition, add stock, sell stock, performance of portfolio, total amount invested on certain date and exit.
      void testBNoPortfolio()
      This test displays a message when the user doesn't have a portfolio.
      void testCThisPortfolioExists()
      This test displays a message to notify the user that the portfolio already exists.
      void testDNotValidInputScreen()
      This test displays an invalid message when the user attempts to input incorrect option.
      void testECreatePortfolioNameScreen()
      This test displays a message for the user to write the name of the portfolio.
      void testFShowBuyStockValueScreen()
      This test displays a message to prompt the user to write the number of shares that are needed to be bought.
      void testGWouldYouLikeToBuyAnotherStockScreen()
      This test displays a message when the user wants to buy another stock or not.
      void testHShowPortfolioNameReenter()
      This test displays an invalid message when the user doesn't enter any name at the time of portfolio creation.
      void testIShowStockBuyReenter()
      This test displays an invalid message if the user enters invalid option while buying a stock.
      void testJShowStockBuyInvalidRetryScreen()
      This test displays an invalid message if the user enters 0 or negative numbers while buying the number of shares.
      void testKShowPortfolioReviewScreen()
      This test displays a message if the user wishes to go back to the main menu or back.
      void testLPortfolioInvalidEntryScreen()
      This test displays an invalid message if the user enters invalid input for viewing portfolio.
      void testMPfReenterDuplicateName()
      This test displays a message to override if the user enters same name that already exists for portfolio creation.
      void testNCorrectDateScreen()
      This test displays an invalid message if user inputs incorrect date.
      void testOCreatePortfolio()
      This test displays screen after create portfolio with the list of all options such as buy stock, main menu, exit.
      void testPShowDisplayPortFolioCreated()
      This test displays a message when portfolio has been successfully created.
      void testQListOfSupportedStocksScreen()
      This test displays a list of supported stocks.
      void testRShowStockDataScreen()
      This test displays stock deatils.
      void testSWhichPortfolioCheck()
      This test asks the user to input the portfolio that needs to be displayed.
      void testTShowPortFolioCompositionScreen()
      This test displays the list of portfolios on the screen as options for the user.
      void testUShowParticularPortfolioFullComposition()
      This test displays details of a particular portfolio - FULL.
      void testVListOfStocksOnDate()
      This test displays the list of stocks available for the user to be sold.
      void testWShowParticularPortfolioCostAnalysis()
      This test displays details of a particular portfolio - COST.

      • Methods inherited from class TestParentClass

        deleteDirectory, deleteFileInDirectory, getBuyStockScreen, getFlexibleInflexibleScreen, getMainScreen, getSetupScreen, getSupportedStocks, readPortfolioCsvIndex, readStockDataFromPortfolioCsv, readStockDateFromStockDataCsv, readStockPriceFromStockDataCsv

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
